price: 48 Ils n’y connaîtront aucune lassitude et ne seront jamais chassés de ce lieu.
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
